text: Ghostwriter is an American children's mystery fantasy thriller TV series created by Liz Nealon. It was produced by Sesame Workshop and BBC One. It first aired in October 1992. It is about a group of friends who solve mysteries. They are helped by an ghost named Ghostwriter. In 1997, CBS aired The New Ghostwriter Mysteries. == References == Category:DHX Media Category:1992 television series debuts Category:1995 television series endings Category:1990s American children's television series Category:1992 American television series debuts Category:1995 American television series endings Category:1995 British television series endings Category:1997 American television series debuts Category:1997 American television series endings Category:2019 American television series debuts Category:American drama television series Category:American time travel television series Category:BBC Television programmes Category:Brooklyn in fiction Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs Category:PBS Kids shows Category:Television series set in New York City
